timeline.bodyHTML:
This still doesn't quite demonstrate the benefit of not(isOdd) vs isOdd.negate()

If you created a static function:

private static boolean isOdd(int i) {
    return i % 2 == 0;
}

then you could use .filter(Predicate.not(JavaElevenFeaturesUnitTest::isOdd)) - which better illustrates how this not only reads nicer, but works on function references.
timeline.author: ashleyfrieze

timeline.message: BAEL-4749: Use method reference in Predicate.not example
